newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIAN LEU ENDS IDLE, MONEY MARKET SHORT.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIAN LEU ENDS IDLE, MONEY MARKET SHORT.

text.p: 1530 GMT - The Romanian leu stayed flat at 3,880/3,930 to the dollar on Wednesday on a quiet interbank market.
* Traders said they saw a slight increase of hard currency offer with most clients rushing to settle leu payments before the end of the year.
* Latest central bank data show $1.5 million interbank volume on Tuesday, when overall trading was $18.5 million.
* Leu-dollar retail prices hovered at around 4,750.
* Short-term funds traded near 55 percent amid leu shortages on the money market.
